billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Provides match-based grants to county-level economic development organizations that are conducting telecommunication assessments for such county
summary: Provides match-based grants to county-level economic development organizations that are conducting telecommunication assessments for such county; requires the department of public service to conduct a study of the state's high-speed internet infrastructure and report the results to the governor, the temporary president of the senate, and the speaker of the assembly.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing regional broadband planning grants
